dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: 2.05 billion dollars. That's President Trump's net worth as of Tuesday, according to Forbes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: two point zero five billion dollars. That's President Trump's net worth as of Tuesday, according to Forbes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thats President Trumps net worth as of Monday, according to Forbes estimate.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And that number is actually, um, central to this new investigation by New York Attorney General Letitia James.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And that number is actually, um, central to this new investigation by New York Attorney General Letitia James.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The valuation of the Seven Springs estate is one particular focus of the investigation because Trump included it as part of his net worth in statements to financial institutions, the complaint says.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right. She's looking into whether the Trump Organization misled investors by overstating asset values—like that Six Springs estate upstate.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. She's looking into whether the Trump Organization misled investors by overstating asset values-like that Six Springs estate upstate.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The investigation also covers an upstate New York estate called Seven Springs, which the attorney general calls significant, along with 40 Wall Street in Manhattan, Trump Tower Chicago and Trumps Los Angeles golf club.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Six Springs was used to claim a huge tax deduction, like 20.9 million dollars back in 2016. And it's part of his net worth statements to banks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Six Springs was used to claim a huge tax deduction, like twenty point nine million dollars back in twenty sixteen. And it's part of his net worth statements to banks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Seven Springs valuation was also used to claim a $21.1 million tax deduction 2015 after the Trump Organization donated part of its 212 acres for conservation efforts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The filing says they're also seeking testimony from Donald Trump Jr., who was supposed to be interviewed back in July but backed out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The filing says they're also seeking testimony from Donald Trump Jr., who was supposed to be interviewed back in July but backed out.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: James is also seeking for a judge to compel the Trump Organization to comply with subpoenas for its financial information, and to force Eric Trump, the companys executive vice president, to sit for an interview.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: He backed out just a day before, yeah. The Trump Org says he won't sit for an interview because of his rights.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He backed out just a day before, yeah. The Trump Org says he won't sit for an interview because of his rights.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He backed out two days prior, and the Trump Organization has since said he will not sit for an interview because of those rights afforded to every individual under the Constitution.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: James is also trying to compel two other people—Charles Martabano and Sheri Dillon—to give interviews.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: James is also trying to compel two other people-Charles Martabano and Sheri Dillon-to give interviews.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: James also seeks to force two people connected to the Trump Organizations work to sit for interviews: land-use lawyer Charles Martabano and Sheri Dillon, a tax representative.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: She tweeted that they need thousands of documents and multiple witnesses. She says, uh, nothing will stop them from following the facts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: She tweeted that they need thousands of documents and multiple witnesses. She says, uh, nothing will stop them from following the facts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are seeking thousands of documents and testimony from multiple witnesses regarding several Trump Organization properties and transactions, including from Eric Trump, who was intimately involved in one or more transactions under review, James wrote on Twitter. Nothing will stop us from following the facts and the law, wherever they may lead.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting this comes right as the DNC kicks off and Biden makes his case for reelection.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting this comes right as the D N C kicks off and Biden makes his case for reelection.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: And it comes as the Republican National Convention kicks off, when President Trump must make his case for reelection in November.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, timing is everything. And Trump hasn't even commented on the filing yet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, timing is everything. And Trump hasn't even commented on the filing yet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Before James filed her complaint, President Trump spoke at the RNC Monday morning after being renominated for the Oval Office and has not yet commented on the filing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The investigation started back in 2019 after Michael Cohen's testimony about inflating asset values.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The investigation started back in twenty nineteen after Michael Cohen's testimony about inflating asset values.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The investigation began in February 2019 after Trumps former personal attorney and fixer, Michael Cohen, told Congress about the inflationary tactic Trump used for his assets, according to the Post.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So it's been going on for a while, and now it's really heating up with this legal push.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's been going on for a while, and now it's really heating up with this legal push.
